statements: DELETE FROM EnergyDistribution WHERE zone_name = 'East Coast';
DELETE FROM EnergyDistribution WHERE demand_forecast > 500 AND power_schedule LIKE '%peak%';
DELETE FROM ZoneSchedules WHERE zone_id = 1 AND schedule_id = 2;
DELETE FROM PowerSchedules WHERE start_time < '2023-01-01' AND end_time > '2023-02-01';
DELETE FROM EnergyUsage WHERE zone_id = 3 AND usage_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM DemandHistory WHERE demand_forecast > 1000 AND forecast_date < '2023-01-01';
